WorkItem.Description:
as i summed up in the title, in Rawr version 5.0.4, if one reopens the Welcome Screen, and then alt tabs, problems arise. 

those problems being, that the welcome screen becomes inaccessible, yet still blocks any attempts at using the normal Rawr window. 

its sorta a catch-22 with the only escape (that i can find) is to kill the Rawr program, and lose all changes made since the last save... ouch.
WorkItem.Summary: Rawr 5.0.4 + alt tabbing + reopened Welcome Screen =....
